mapper.insert: insert into t_regulations (id, title, author, publishdate, dptid, pageview,summary, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageview,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update t_regulations set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishdate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dptid = #{dptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary= #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, title, author, publishdate, reg.dptid, pageview,dept.dptname, (SELECT CONCAT(id,'|',title) FROM t_regulations WHERE publishdate > reg.publishdate ORDER BY publishdate DESC LIMIT 1) as `front`, (SELECT CONCAT(id,'|',title) FROM t_regulations WHERE publishdate < reg.publishdate ORDER BY publishdate DESC LIMIT 1) as `next` from t_regulations reg left join t_sys_dept dept on reg.dptid=dept.dptid where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, title, author, publishdate, reg.dptid, pageview,dept.dptname from t_regulations reg left join t_sys_dept dept on reg.dptid=dept.dptid order by reg.publishdate desc

mapper.update: UPDATE t_regulations SET pageview = pageview + 1 WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
